Texto: 
non-contributory
surgery may be undertaken if patient is refractory to medical therapy for epilepsy.
• 1 cm extra-axial lesion anterior aspect of left middle cranial fossa.
• lesion isointense on t1, hyperintense on t2 scans and demonstrates very high signal on dwi images.
epidermoid cyst
• epidermoid cyst
• arachnoid cyst
• abscess
2 year old girl who underwent mri for a seizure disorder.
